name: ChaosMaster's TimeWaster in Chaotic Non-Sense
description:
Welp, here it is. My 1st (Publicly playable) BBRMS Mod ChaosMaster's Time Waster!

It was orignally a further house mod but, I of course, change my mind.

STORY:

It was another day for the Ed-Boys, until Double-D told Ed and Eddy that someone is stealing their jawbreakers and Eddy (you) want to get them back, but ChaosMaster got himself some pals to help him like Ashley, Four, Dedede, Luigi, Ala-Gold, Siri, Mallow and more! Can you beat ChaosMaster's ass or he'll kick yours? Play this mod to find out :)

You already know, swearing and earrape.

Paulor94 is the creator of this map if you want to play the unmodded version of it then play here:

Gamejolt: https://gamejolt.com/games/bbrms-2-baldi-quirky-academy/502935

Itch.io: https://paulor94.itch.io/bbrms-2-baldi-quirky-academy 

Gamebanana:  https://gamebanana.com/gamefiles/11833

Credits go to the owners of everything that I used in this mod (Characters, Sounds, Music, Etc)

if you said i copied king k rool's basics in defeating donkey kong, you have the right to say that cuz that's exactly what i did lmao.
